Aqwl nZm Altdryb l>n AlqwY AlEAmlp AlErbyp qd lA tkwn mhy>p kmA yjb lttnAsb mE qwY Alswq. yqwdnA *lk AlY mdY ArtbAT j*b AlAstvmArAt btHsyn qdrAt AlqwY AlEAmlp wAlEnSr Alb$ry fy AlAqtSAd wAlAntAj. AlArAdp AlsyAsyp wAltktlAt & Aldwl AlErbyp Alty dxlt mnZmp AltjArp AlEAlmyp Antsbt fy $kl frdy whk*A hy HAl Aldwl Alty tstEd Al|n lldxwl. mA Al*y yHwl fy r>yk dwn AqAmp AltktlAt AlAqtSAdyp AlErbyp llHd mn t>vyr AlmnAfsp gyr AlmtkAf}p mE Aldwl Almtqdmp؟ Ahw AlEql AlsyAsy llHAkm AlErby Am mA*A؟ - Aldwl AlErbyp Alqlylp Alty Antsbt HtY AlAn AlY mnZmp AltjArp AlEAlmyp mvl Almgrb wmSr wtwns dxlt AfrAdyAF. Al>myn AlEAm llmnZmp Alfrnkwfwnyp fy byrwt mhmp vqAfyp lA tnfy AlsyAsyp Al 425 ElY >srA}yl Altnfy* fwrA(Swrp)
wSl AlY byrwt msA' Ams AlAmyn AlEAm llmnZmp Alfrnkwfwnyp Aldktwr bTrs bTrs gAly llm$Arkp fy AfttAH AljmEyp AlEAmp AlvAnyp E$rp lrAbTp AljAmEAt AlnATqp klyA Aw jz}yA bAllgp Alfrnsyp، Awblf wjAmEp $bkAt AltwASl bAllgp Alfrnsyp، Awryf Alty yfttHhA Alywm r}ys Aljmhwryp AlyAs AlhrAwy fy qSr AlAwnyskw. wsyltqy Aldktwr gAly wAlms&wlyn AllbnAnyyn wybHv mEhm fy Amwr mxtlfp lAsymA AlqrAr 425. wkAn fy AstqbAl gAly fy AlmTAr، wzyr AlvqAfp wAltElym AlEAly fwzy Hby$ mmvlA r}ys AlHkwmp rfyq AlHryry wsfyr frnsA fy lbnAn dAnyAl jwAnw wsfyr mSr fy lbnAn EAdl AlxDry wr}ys AljAmEp AllbnAnyp Aldktwr AsEd dyAb wAlmdyr AlEAm llfrnkwfwnyp my$Al gyw wAlAmyn AlEAm lm&ssp jwzf wlwr mgyzl Aldktwr fAdy mgyzl w$xSyAt. wtHdv Aldktwr gAly fy AlmTAr wqAl: Awd An AEbr En srwry lwjwdy fy byrwt wfy lbnAn wAHyy Al$Eb AllbnAny wAlHkwmp AllbnAnyp، swf A$Ark fy m&tmr AljAmEAt AlmrtbTp bAlmnZmp Alfrnkwfwnyp Aw AlwkAlp AljAmEyp llmnZmp Alfrnkwfwnyp، wmn* AntxAby fy mntSf nwfmbr (t$ryn AlvAny) AlmADy lmnSb AlAmyn AlEAm llmnZmp Aldwlyp llfrnkwfwnyp AEml ElY rbT AlwkAlAt Almxtlfp AlmrtbTp bAlfrnkwfwnyp kmA AEml ElY tn$yT AltEAwn byn tlk AlmnZmp Aljdydp wAlmnZmAt Aldwlyp AlAxrY An kAnt jAmEp Aldwl AlErbyp، Alkwmnwlv AlbryTAny، AlAmm AlmtHdp Aw AlAwnyskw. wAnny ElY Atm AstEdAd llAjAbp En Ay s&Al. s}l، mn xlAl xbrtk AldyblwmAsyp fy AlAmm AlmtHdp، hnAk AlqrAr 425 Atx*th Alhy}p AlEAmp llAmm AlmtHdp fy $>n jnwb lbnAn wAsrA}yl tErql h*A AlqrAr wtsEY AlY tEdylh. mA hy r&ytk lh*A AlqrAr؟ AjAb: AlqrAr wADH wfy r>yy yjb tnfy*h fwrA wmn* snwAt Edp wyjb An nTAlb wAn nEml mn Ajl tHqyqh dwn $rT. s}l: fy Zl mA ytdAwl mn tEdyl AlqrAryn 425 w426، hl yjwz tEdyl qrAr lmjls AlAmn؟. AjAb: A*A wAfq، mjls AlAmn lh AlslTp fy tEdyl qrAr wr>yy Anh lA dAEy lAy tEdyl. s}l AlA yEtbr AlqrAr 425 Anh mbrm wElY AsrA}yl An tnf*h؟ AjAb: AlqrAr wADH wyTlb AnsHAb AlqwAt AlAsrA}ylyp mn AlArADy AllbnAnyp. wAlAmm AlmtHdp tDmn AlwHdp AlAqlymyp lldwl AlAEDA'. lbnAn dwlp EDw، Asst wA$trkt fy t>sys AlAmm AlmtHdp fyjb AHtrAm AlwHdp AlAqlymyp lljmhwryp AllbnAnyp. s}l: hnAk mElwmAt tqwl An AlAmyn AlEAm llAmm AlmtHdp kwfy AnAn ysEY HAlyA AlY t$kyl ljnp llnZr fy h*A AlqrAr؟ AjAb: AldyblwmAsyp ttTlb An lA yElq AlAmyn AlEAm ElY AlAmyn AlEAm Aljdyd Aw AlsAbq. s}l: hl tbHv mwDwE AlqrAr 425 mE Alms&wlyn AllbnAnyyn؟ AjAb: A*A Tlb mny An AnAq$ h*A AlmwDwE، f>nA ElY Atm AstEdAd lmnAq$th wAbdA' Alr>y wAlHwAr. s}l: mn hnA، hl ldyk TrwHAt mHddp fy h*A AlmjAl؟ AjAb: An mhmty fy lbnAn hy llA$rAf ElY m&tmr wAlqA' mHADrp wAlmhmp vqAfyp. wbmwjb mnSby ly Sfp syAsyp wAnny ElY Atm AstEdAd lmnAq$p Ay qDyp syAsyp. s}l: dfEt vmnA gAlyA jdA tmvl bEdm Altjdyd lk fy AlAmm AlmtHdp lwqwfk AlY jAnb lbnAn wqDyp qAnA tHdydA، hl tHfZ Alsyd AnAn tjAh AlqrAr 425 hw mxAfp mvl h*h AlntA}j؟ AjAb: sbq wqlt An lA tElyq ly ElY AlAmyn AlEAm Aljdyd Aw AlAmyn AlEAm AlsAbq. wAmA mwqfy flA yEtbr tDHyp wAnmA wAjb wlA $kr ElY wAjb. s}l: hl tzwr qAnA؟ AjAb: An $A' Allh. s}l: fy Hdyv sAbq lk An AlmnZmp Alfrnkwfwnyp ElY AstEdAd lmsAEdp lbnAn fy AlHrkp AldyblwmAsyp An Tlb mnhA *lk. fmA hw mjAl h*h AlmsAEdp An Tlbt mnkm؟ AjAb: r>yy An Ahm mjhwd tstTyE An tb*lh Alfrnkwfwnyp hw tEb}p Alr>y AlEAm lAhmyp tnfy* AlqrAr 425 En Tryq AlAElAm Aw En Tryq AlAtSAlAt AlvnA}yp Aw En Tryq Eml dyblwmAsy. s}l: kyf tfsr AlDgT ElY AlErAq ltnfy* AlqrAr AlSAdr En mjls AlAmn Aldwly، wlA ymArs HZ_r dwly ElY AsrA}yl ltnfy* AlqrAr 425؟ AjAb: An mjls AlAmn syAsy wAlsyAsp lhA AEtbArAt xASp tElmwnhA.

Alm&tmr Aldwly lltrjmp blg *rwth bmdAxlAt Hwl >nsAn AlnSwS Almtwgl
Axttm Alm&tmr Aldwly lltrjmp Al*y nZmth mdrsp Altrjmp ljAmEp Alqdys ywsf AEmAlh fy Hrm klyp AlElwm AlTbyp، wtwzE brnAmj Alywm AlAxyr ElY ArbE jlsAt. Aljlsp AlAwlY bHv Alm&tmrwn fy Aljlsp AlAwlY fy Altrjmp AlAdbyp: AlmqArbAt wAlnZryAt wr>sthA mwnyk Awtyh، r}ysp qsm Allgp AlErbyp fy Almdrsp AlElyA lltrjmp fy jAmEp bArys 3 wtDmnt ArbE mdAxlAt. fy mdAxlth: AlAdb AlmSry wAltrjmp AEAd ry$Ar jAkswn whw mtrjm yEy$ fy mSr drs wDE Altrjmp wrhAnAthA fy AlHql AlAdby AlmSry، AlmTmwr EAlmyA، AstnAdA AlY AldrAsAt AlAxyrp Hwl Altrjmp wAldrAsp AlAjtmAEyp llHql AlAdby. wtwqf gwnzAlw bArbA fy jAmEp kAstyA - lAmn$A fy AsbAnyA، fy mdAxlth AlAdb AlErby bAlAsbAnyp trjmAt llEArfyn End ZAhrp Ant$Ar AlklmAt AlErbyp Almnswxp bAlHrwf AllAtynyp Aw AlklmAt AlAsbAnyp *At AlASl AlErby، fy AlnSwS Almtrjmp mn AlErbyp AlY AlAsbAnyp. AmA nyrAn nAjy mn jAmEp AlAsrA' fy AlArdn، fbHvt mdAxlthA AlnZryAt wAlmqArbAt fy tElym trjmp AlmsrH fy tdAxl EnASr Edydp wmxtlfp fy trjmp AlmsrH ElY SEyd Almrslp، wwsylp AySAlhA AlY Aljmhwr، mn jhp، wElY SEyd Allgp AlmsrHyp mn jhp AxrY. wtklmt frnswAz wylmArt fy Almrkz AlAwrwby lltrjmp AlAdbyp fy brwksyl fy mdAxlthA En Almtrjm AlAdby: nAql vqAfp. EA}lthA lm tqSr، bAEt mA tmlk wtntql bhA mn* vlAvp AEwAm mA byn mst$fyAt Aljnwb wAlEASmp. why mn bldp HAnyn fy Al$ryT AlmHtl wtqTn AsrthA fy AlbAzwryp fy qDA' Swr، wtlmy*p fy Sf AlrwDp. wldt fy EA}lp EAnt Alkvyr bsbb Althjyr، wmn lA y*kr bldthA HAnyn Alty thjr AhlhA wdmrt mnAzlhm wxrbt mmtlkAthm EAm 1976؟ dq AhlhA AbwAb mnAzl Alms&wlyn wAlnwAb fy Swr wAlzhrAny wSydA، wSwlAF AlY AlEASmp wAlDAHyp Aljnwbyp، lknhm lm yklfwA Anfshm EnA' Alrd wAlAstmAE AlY mEAnAp gydA' wrbmA yEwd Alsbb AlY An$gAlhm bAlrd ElY AlmwAqf AlAsrA}ylyp mn mwDwE AlqrAr 425. gydA' t$bh ATfAlkm yA sAdp، lA bl hy Ajml wArq. tDHk wtbtsm wtbky، wmn HqhA An tEy$. AlA tEtqdwn An nfqAt ElAjhA Aql mn tklfp Hflp E$A' tqymwnhA fy fnAdq AlEASmp wAlxArj؟ AlA tEtqdwn An nfqAt h*h AlEmlyp Aql mn rHlp AstjmAm tqDwnhA fy EwASm AwrwbA. wmA dmnA fy $hr nysAn fEA}lthA lm tgAdr mnzlhA fy EdwAn nysAn 1996 lAn nyrAn Althjyr lwEthA. wAlmfArqp An wAldhA mA zAl AlY Alywm mxdwEAF bxTAbAt Alms&wlyn wAlnwAb wzEmA' AlAHzAb. gydA' yA sEAp Alxyr tmwt AmAm AEyn wAldthA. AhlhA AlmsAkyn ynA$dwn h*h Almrp، Ebr AlnhAr، Alr&sA' AlvlAvp wzwjAthm wystSrxwn DmA}r AlmHsnyn wAhl Alxyr، A*A bqy AnAs mn h*h Alf}p fy h*A Albld. AlkAbl mDrwb! mwATn mn mnTqp zwq mSbH qrb bnk byblws $kA AnqTAE AltyAr AlkhrbA}y En AlmnTqp bSwrp mstmrp mn* ywm AlAHd AlmADy wlm tEmd frq AlSyAnp AlY ASlAH AlAETAl wAEAdp t>myn AltyAr. wTAlb bAlkhrbA'. & mSdr fy m&ssp khrbA' lbnAn nfY An ykwn AlETl HSl ywm AlAHd w>kd An AlkAbl mDrwb wtEml Alm&ssp ElY ASlAHh wSyAnth. m>sAp AlkhrbA' fy byt mry mn gsAn mADy: AnhA m>sAp Hqyqyp fmn* vlAvp A$hr nEy$ fy bldp byt mry qlb Almtn AlnAbD blA khrbA' lyl nhAr. ntSl bmktb AlkhrbA' fy bldp bEbdAt wlA mn yjyb، wA*A AjAbwA fyqwlwn Anhm yjhlwn AlAsbAb، wAlms&wl gA}b! AstErD AlkAtb fy AlHlqtyn AlsAbqtyn mxtlf AlnZryAt Hwl ZAhrp AlEwlmp Alty tEml Al|n ElY twHyd AlEAlm AstnAdA AlY vwrty AltknwlwjyA wAlAswAq AlHrp AlEmlAqp. wfy h*h AlHlqp AlvAlvp nZrp AlY AlEwlmp qyd AltTbyq fy AlmnTqp AlErbyp: fy gDwn $hr wAHd، n$r fy wA$nTn tHlylAn mhmAn، rk~zA b_ AlSdfp ElY s&Al ytym: lmA*A ttxl~f AlmnTqp AlErbyp، mn dwn sA}r mnATq AlEAlm، En rkb AlEwlmp wAldymwqrATyp؟ AltHlyl AlAwl kAn llAkAdymy AlAmyrky، AllbnAny AlASl، f&Ad Ejmy، Al*y sAq AlmElwmAt Almhmp Al|typ: nHw 260 mlywn nsmp، yqTnwn qws AlAzmp Al$AsE Almmtd mn Almgrb AlY AyrAn، ySd~rwn mjtmEyn slEAF mSn~Ep Aql mmA tSd~r fnlndA bmlAyynhA Alxmsp! mnTqp Al$rq AlAwsT w$mAl AfryqyA lA tstqTb swY wAHd fy Alm}p mn AlrsAmyl AlEAlmyp AlxASp. HkwmAt Al$rq AlAwsT (Aldwl AlErbyp wAyrAn)، lA tzAl m$lwlp mn* ArbEp Eqwd، bsbb AlfsAd wmSAlH AlAjhzp AlbyrwqrATyp، wAlxwf mn An y&dy tqlyS AlqTAE AlxAS AlY lAstqrAr syAsy. wmE *lk، f<n h*h AlHkwmAt stkwn mDTrp qrybA lAtxA* ASEb AlqrArAt AlmtElqp bAlASlAHAt AlAqtSAdyp fy wDH AlnhAr، wElY AyqAE Djyj Al$bAb AlyA}syn Al*yn ymkn An ystqTbhm Ay dymAgwjy Aw Ay Hrkp syAsyp AnthAzyp. wHyn*Ak sytrHm HkAm AlmnTqp (wAlklAm mA zAl lEjmy) ElY tlk AlAyAm AlxwAly Alty kAn ykfy fyhA ATlAq Al$EArAt Alqwmyp Almlthbp l<rDA' f}At Al$Eb klhA. h*h kAnt |rA' f&Ad Ejmy؛ why |rA' tt$Abh mE mqdmAt AltHlyl AlvAny Al*y qd~mh AlkAtb AlAmyrky jwn lAnkstr، lknhA txtlf EnhA fy AlxlASAt. fAlAxyr y$d~d AyDA ElY >n EqwdA Twylp mn AlsyAsAt AlAnqlAbyp Almstndp AlY AltxTyT Almrkzy wAlmjAbhp AlEskryp Almklfp mE AsrA}yl، >EAqt nmw AqtSAdAt Alswq AlHrp AlHdyvp fy mEZm AnHA' AlEAlm AlErby. wntyjp l*lk، yDyf lAnkstr، txl~ft h*h AlAqtSAdAt AlY Hd kbyr En rkb AzdhAr AlEwlmp Alty ySfhA b>nhA AqtSAdAt Alswq Alty twl~d، wAn fy $kl gyr mtsAwK، vrwAt lA mvyl lhA fy kl mkAn tqrybA، mn |syA AlY AmyrkA AllAtynyp mrwrA bAldwl Al$ywEyp AlsAbqp fy AwrwbA Al$rqyp. wkmA Ejmy، yqd~m lAnkstr AlmETyAt (Almqz~zp) Al|typ: AlmnTqp AlErbyp *At AlAhmyp AlAstrAtyjyp، Almmtdp mn Almgrb fy Algrb، AlY AlTrf Aljnwby l$bh Aljzyrp AlErbyp، t}n tHt wT>p AsrE nmw skAny fy AlEAlm، w>bT> nmw AqtSAdy fy AlEAlm AyDA. byn EAmy 1981 w1990، AnxfDt AlmdAxyl AlxASp bnsbp Avnyn fy Alm}p snwyA fy Al$rq AlAwsT (mA EdA AsrA}yl). wh*A، wfq Albnk Aldwly Akbr AnHdAr fy AlmnATq AlnAmyp klhA. AmA AlbTAlp fsjlt AElY mEdlAt fy AlEAlm. AqtSAd AsrA}yl، bmlAyynhA Alxmsp، ywAzy AqtSAdAt kl mn mSr wswryA wAlArdn wlbnAn (bmlAyynhA AlvmAnyp wAlvmAnyn) mjtmEp. EAm 1995، blg Hjm AlAstvmArAt AlAjnbyp AlmbA$rp fy Al$rq AlAwsT w$mAl AfryqyA، nHw 4 mlyArAt dwlAr fqT، bAlmqArnp mE 27 mlyArA fy AmyrkA AllAtynyp w12 mlyArA fy $rq AwrwbA wwsThA، w65 mlyArA fy jnwb |syA wjnwb $rqhA (wfq mElwmAt Al>mm AlmtHdp). lkn lAnkstr، wElY rgm h*h AlmETyAt AldAknp، lys mt$A}mA kEjmy. fhw yrY An AlHkwmAt AlErbyp، wmEZmhA AstbdAdy، ln ytmkn mn AdAmp Ezl AlmnTqp En qwY AldymwqrATyp wAlEwlmp Alltyn tgyrAn Al|n wjh AlbsyTp. fEAjlAF >m |jlAF، stkwn h*h AlHkwmAt mDTrp >n tH*w H*w tlk AlHfnp mn Aldwl AlErbyp (mvl mSr wAlmgrb wAlArdn wtwns) Alty bd>t rHlp tHryr AlAqtSAd wftH AlHdwd. wh*h AlrHlp (A*A wASlt TryqhA)، st&dy lA mHAlp AlY wSwl Alvwrp AldymwqrATyp AxyrA AlY AlmnTqp AlErbyp، bsbb AlArtbAT byn AlAnftAH AlAqtSAdy wAltEddyp AlsyAsyp. AlzlzAl... ln ntsA'l Ay AlTrfyn، Ejmy Aw lAnkstr، ElY Hq fy xlASAth، bl snqArb Alms>lp mn zAwyp AxrY hy: hl ymkn AlqwY AlAqtSAdyp AlEAlmyp، Alty tumsk Al|n bxnAq dwl AlEAlm klhA، wtdfEhA dfEA AlY AlAndmAj fy tktlAt wAswAq Aqlymyp kbrY txdm mSAlH AlEwlmp، An ttrk HkwmAt AlmnTqp twASl ErbdthA AlAnEzAlyp wAllAdymwqrATyp؟ wnrd sryEA: klA. fAlzlzAl AlAqtSAdy AlEAlmy AlrAhn، A$bh b*lk AlHdv Aljywlwjy Aw AlfDA}y AlDxm Al*y tsb~b fy AnqrAD AldynASwrAt En sTH AlArD، Aw b*lk AlAnqlAb AlAqtSAdy - AlsyAsy fy Alqrn AlxAms E$r، Al*y qDY ElY AlAqTAEyAt wAqAm mkAnhA nZAm Aldwlp - Al>mp Al*y syTr ElY AlEAlm TwAl Alqrwn Alxmsp AlmnSrmp. wkmA fy AlzlAzl AlDxmp wAlAnqlAbAt AltAryxyp AlkbrY، lys fy wsE Ay mnTqp An ttlTY TwylA fy qwqEthA AllAtAryxyp fy mn>Y En t>vyrAt h*h AlzlAzl wAlAnqlAbAt. wAlmnTqp AlErbyp ln tkwn AstvnA'، HtY lw qrr mEZm HkAmhA AlAntHAr wnHr $Ewbhm ElY An ysl~mwA AlAmAnp AlY AlmrHlp AltAryxyp Aljdydp fy AlEAlm. fAlAqtSAd AlEAlmy Al*y ynjH Al|n fy tdjyn dwl kbrY kbryTAnyA wfrnsA wAlmAnyA، wHtY AlwlAyAt AlmHdp nfshA، wfy <dmAj qwp ElY w$k An tSbH dwlp EZmY kAlSyn، ln tstESy Elyh dwl fqyrp wmwbw'p bAltnAqDAt kAldwl AlErbyp، wlA HkwmAt bAtt tftqd AlY AlHd AlAdnY mn Al$rEyp kmA gAlbyp AlHkwmAt AlErbyp. h*h nqTp. AmA AlnqTp AlvAnyp، wAlAhm، fhy An AlmnTqp AlErbyp، bmwqEhA AlAstrAtyjy wvrwAthA wAswAqhA Almstqblyp AlmHtmlp، >vmn mn An yusmH lhA bAlAnglAq wAltqwqE fy xym bAlyp wmEskrAt mhlhlp، xArj AswAr AlAqtSAd AlEAlmy. wh*h lyst twqEAt Aw nZryAt. A* An AxtrAq AlEwlmp AlmnTqp bd> bAlfEl. wmSr rbmA ttHw~l qrybA Alnmw*j AlAbrz (wAlAnjH) lh*A AlAxtrAq. kyf؟ mSr mutnm~rp؟ Alkvyr mn AlmHllyn Algrbyyn bAtwA ytHdvwn Al|n En TaraqAt mSryp qwyp ElY AbwAb AlEwlmp. lkn h*A lA yEny Anh ASbH fy wsEnA AlHdyv En brwz nmr |sywy jdyd ElY DfAf Alnyl. lmA*A؟ snErf AlAsbAb bEd qlyl. lkn qbl *lk، flnstErD mEA bED mETyAt AxtrAq AlEwlmp lmSr wmDAEfAthA. tqwl Al_ fAynn$yl tAyms، fy mlHq xAS ASdrth AxyrA En mSr، An AlASlAHAt AlAqtSAdyp AlmSryp Almstmrp mn* EAm 1992، njHt fy rfE Elm mSr ElY xryTp AlAstvmArAt Aldwlyp؛ wfy AqnAE Alnxb AlmSryp (ElY AlAql) b>n AlAqtSAd dxl mrHlp AntqAlyp nHw nmw mtwASl vAbt wmwj~h nHw AltSdyr. wAlArqAm Alty nu$rt HdyvA t&kd h*A AlnjAH: fAHtyATy mSr mn AlEmlAt AlSEbp، qfz mn 600 mlywn dwlAr qbl snwAt qlylp، AlY nHw 19 mlyAr dwlAr Al|n. wAltDxm AnxfD mn 22 fy Alm}p AlY 7 fy Alm}p. wAlEjz fy AlmwAznp، Al*y kAn y$k~l fy AlsAbq 16 AlY 17 fy Alm}p، tql~S Al|n AlY wAHd fy Alm}p. wtDE mSr nSb EynyhA HAlyA rfE mEdlAt Alnmw AlAqtSAdy mn nHw xmsp fy Alm}p snwyA، AlY 5،6 fy Alm}p xlAl AlsnwAt AlvlAv Almqblp، bHyv ytsnY AmtSAS dxwl nSf mlywn $xS AlY swq AlEml kl EAm. wh*A gyr mmkn mn dwn rfE mstwyAt AlAdxAr Alqwmy wAlAstvmArAt AlrAhnp Alty tqf Al|n ElY Hdwd 18 fy Alm}p mn AlnAtj Alqwmy AlEAm، whw nSf AlmstwY AlsA}d byn AqtSAdAt Alnmwr Al|sywyp. wwfq tqdyrAt AlHkwmp wSndwq Alnqd Aldwly، yftrD bmSr An trfE mEdlAt AlAdxAr bmA yrAwH byn 25 AlY 28 fy Alm}p. wwfrt mwjp EmlyAt AlxSxSp AlEAm AlmADy، wAlty AEqbt Awl Emlyp byE kbrY l$rkp tmlkhA Aldwlp (mdynp nSr llAskAn)، nSf AlzyAdAt Alsnwyp AlmTlwbp llAstvmArAt. kmA bAEt AlHkwmp، Ebr AlbwrSp، mEZm 40 $rkp Aw jz'A kbyrA mn Akvr mnhA، mn ASl 314 $rkp tAbEp lldwlp، tqrr txSyShA. wh*A sAEdhA ElY j*b mwqE AstvmAry xArjy qd~rh Sndwq Alnqd Aldwly bnHw 3،1 mlyAr dwlAr llsnp AlmAlyp Alty Antht fy 30 HzyrAn AlmADy. h*A ADAfp AlY AstvmArAt xArjyp mbA$rp qd~rt bnHw 800 mlywn dwlAr (Hjm AlAstvmArAt AlxArjyp lm ytjAwz 50 mlywnA fy AlsAbq). Altnfs bAlSAdrAt wyqwl wzyr AlAqtSAd AlmSry ywsf gAly، whw >Hd Abrz AlEqwl Almdb~rp lh*A Altwjh، Anh xlAl AlsnwAt AlE$r Almqblp، yjb An nEy$ wntnfs bAlSAdrAt. fh*h AlTryqp AlwHydp Alty stETynA nsbp nmw AqtSAdy trAwH byn 6 w8 fy Alm}p. HsnAF. h*A TmwH wAqEy. lkn dwnh AjrA'At AxrY Drwryp ttjAwz EmlyAt AlxSxSp AlrAhnp. wh*A yEydnA AlY s&AlnA AlAwl En $rwT tHw~l mSr nmrAF |sywyAF. A* yjb AlqyAm bASlAHAt bnywyp Emyqp ElY Almstwyyn AlAdAry - AlbyrwqrATy wAlsyAsy mHyw sEd
AlAjtmAEy، lA ybdw An AlASlAHAt AlmSryp stHqq AhdAfhA Almn$wdp، A*A mA wASlt Alnxbp AlHAkmp rfD md~ h*h AlASlAHAt AlY bunY AlslTp AlsyAsyp. fAlmstvmrwn AlmSrywn، kmA AlAjAnb، ln ywZ~fwA AmwAlhm bHmAsp fy blAd Alnyl، A*A mA Akt$fwA b>n AlASlAHAt ln tfEl $y}A swY tEzyz sTwp Ajhzp Al>mn wAlmxAbrAt wAlqwAt AlmslHp، l>n *lk syEny AmkAn AltrAjE En h*h AlASlAHAt fy Ay lHZp. wyqwl mstvmr mSrfy mSry: sybqY AlxTr mHyqAF b$rEyp AlASlAH AlAqtSAdy، AlY >n ytHqq AlASlAH AldymwqrATy. h*A ADAfp AlY An AHtfAZ Alnxbp AlmHdwdp nfshA bAlslTp AlsyAsyp wAHtkArhA lhA syEnyAn An AlASlAHAt AlAqtSAdyp ln tfyd swY Hfnp D}ylp mn AlmHZwZyn Al*yn sytwzEwn AlvrwAt. wh*A sy&dy AlY AstqTAb HAd fy AlmjtmE byn AlAgnyA' wAlfqrA'، wAlY tfAqm ZAhrp AltTrf AlAslAmy. wyEtrf wzyr mSry bArz b>n mSr lA tzAl fy mrHlp mA qbl AldymwqrATyp. lknh yDyf An AltwjhAt AlAqtSAdyp AlrAhnp st&vr fy AlnhAyp ElY AlxTAb AlsyAsy. fy Ay HAl، vmp EwAml fy AlnZAm st&dy AlY Altgyyr AlsyAsy، AhmhA An AlnjAH AlAqtSAdy lm yEd mEtmdA ElY mfAtyH AlslTp AlsyAsyp. EAmlAn hl tfA&l Alwzyr AlmSry fy mHlh؟ AlArjH Anh k*lk، Aw sykwn k*lk، bfEl EAmlyn Avnyn: AlAwl، Anh lm yEd bmstTAE Alnxb AlmSryp AlHAkmp، AltrAjE bshwlp En nhjhA AlAqtSAdy Aljdyd، lys l>nh yHqq njAHAt wADHp fHsb، bl AyDA l>n klfp h*A AltrAjE، AjtmAEyA wsyAsyA wdwlyA، stkwn fwq TAqp AlnZAm ElY AltHm~l. wh*A syfrD ElY Alnxb fy AlnhAyp، AlrDwx l$rwT Almstvmryn wmTAlbhm: Hkm AlqAnwn wAstqlAl AlqDA' wnzAhth؛ fSl AlslTAt؛ wAEAdp AlAEtbAr AlY Alswq AlsyAsyp Ebr dymwqrATyp Hqyqyp wtEddyp Hqyqyp. wAlEAml AlvAny hw dwr AlqwY AlAqtSAdyp AlEAlmyp. fAlxSxSp، wftH AlHdwd، wtHryr AlAqtSAd، wtqlyS AlbyrwqrATyp، klhA AjrA'At ttTlbhA Emlyp AlAndmAj fy AqtSAd EAlmy mwH~d yqwm brmth ElY AltnAfs wAlfAElyp. wh*h AlAjrA'At stqwy qdrp AlmjtmE Almdny ElY AlmTAlbp bm$Arkp AwsE fy Swg AlqrArAt AlAqtSAdyp، kmA AlsyAsyp، wtAlyA tftH AlAbwAb AmAm AHtmAlAt tTbyq dymwqrATyp Hqyqyp. ... wdwl AxrY h*A mA yHdv Al|n ElY DfAf Alnyl. f_ Alnmr lm~A yZhr bEd، lkn |vAr AqdAmh ASbHt jlyp hnA whnAk. wkmA qAl f&Ad Ejmy (wbHq h*h Almrp!) f<n AmwAj AlEwlmp AlEAtyp wSlt AlY mSr... AxyrA. lkn mA*A En bqyp AlmnTqp AlErbyp؟ qlp mn Aldwl AlErbyp tH*w H*w mSr، fy mlAmsp ESr AlEwlmp bsrEp nsbyp. lkn h*h Alqlp stkwn qrybA، xSwSA fy HAl njAH tjrbp AlASlAHAt، AlqAEdp (wgyrhA AlAstvnA') lltTwrAt Almqblp fy Al$rq AlAwsT AlErby. mn byn h*h Aldwl، ytHr~k Almgrb bxTY Hvyvp fy ASlAHAth AlAqtSAdyp (wk*lk AlAmr bAlnsbp AlY twns). fhw yEyd bsrEp، AEAdp bnA' AqtSAdh، AstEdAdA ltTbyq AtfAq AltjArp AlHrp mE AlAtHAd AlAwrwby. wAl$rkAt Almgrbyp ASbHt AfDl trkyzA wAdArp. wh*A sysAEd ElY dEm Alnmw AlAqtSAdy mstqblA. wyqwl tqryr lmjlp mydl Ayst، An AlAElAn En AstvmArAt kbrY stqwm bhA $rktA dAww Alkwryp wTwmswn Alfrnsyp fy Almgrb، sAEd ElY dEm Alvqp bAqtSAd h*h Aldwlp AlAfryqyp Al$mAlyp. wElY rgm An AlqTAE AlzrAEy Almhm fy Almgrb، mEr~D llxTr bsbb AlHwAjz wAlqywd AlAwrwbyp (ElY Eks AlqTAE AlSnAEy، wxSwSA mntwjAt AlAqm$p wAlAH*yp)، AlA An AlAqtSAd ywASl tTwrh nHw AlslE AlAkvr qymp. wt&kd wzArp AlxSxSp Almgrbyp tSmymhA ElY tEjyl brnAmj AltxSyS fy AjwA' syAsyp wAjtmAEyp Akvr hdw'A؛ xSwSA bEdmA wq~Et AlHkwmp wArbAb AlEml wnqAbAt AlEmAl EqdA AjtmAEyA vlAvyA lDmAn mSAlH AljmyE xlAl h*h AlmrHlp AlAntqAlyp. wmn* bd' Emlyp AlxSxSp EAm 1993، bAEt AlHkwmp Almgrbyp 52 $rkp (mn ASl 114 tqrr byEhA)، mmA rfE AlEA}dAt AlmxSSp llAstvmAr bnHw 5،1 mlyAr dwlAr. &&& lkn Al_ fAynn$yl tAyms A$Art AlY Anh bEd byE Al$rkAt AlEAmp AlmrbHp AwlA، ASbH mn AlSEb xSxSp bqyp Al$rkAt؛ AlAmr Al*y xlq SEwbAt fy wjh AlASlAHAt AlAqtSAdyp. AlArdn wfy AlArdn، ybdw An AlHkwmp mSr~p ElY AlmDy qdmAF fy ASlAHAthA AlAqtSAdyp، ElY rgm AEmAl AlEnf AlwAsEp Alty $hdthA AlblAd Hyv tm AlgA' AldEm AlHkwmy lbED AlslE Alg*A}yp. wlA ryb An AnDmAm AlArdn AlY mnZmp AltjArp AlEAlmyp، wtwqyE AtfAq AltEAwn Aljdyd mE AlAtHAd AlAwrwby، sysAEdAnh ElY tHqyq h*A Alhdf. lkn hnAk EAmlyn yEwqAn Alnmw AlAqtSAdy AlArdny، hmA: AstmrAr tjmyd AlElAqAt Aldwlyp mE AlErAq Al*y kAn ymtS rbE AltjArp AlxArjyp AlArdnyp؛ wtrdd Almstvmryn wAlsyAH fy Altdfq ElY AlblAd bsbb tdhwr Emlyp AlslAm byn AlErb wAlAsrA}ylyyn. bAlTbE، kl h*h AlAjrA'At AlASlAHyp، lA tzAl fy bdAyAthA AlAwlY، wlm~A ttj*r bEd fy Aldwl Alty tTbqhA. wmE *lk، kAn mn Almvyr An ylAHZ tqryr n$rh AxyrA Albnk Aldwly، b>n AlArdn wtwns wAlmgrb، ADAfp AlY mSr، kAnt AlwHydp byn Aldwl AlErbyp Alty Hqqt tqdmA AqtSAdyA، ElY rgm (wbsbb!) qlp mwArdhA AlTbyEyp. wjA' Altqryr: >n EmlyAt tHryr AltjArp wAlASlAHAt AlAxrY Alty Atux*t fy ftrp AlvmAnynAt wAwA}l AltsEynAt، jElt h*h Aldwl tEAny nmwA AsrE fy AlmdAxyl wAlSAdrAt wtwfyr AlwZA}f، mn kl dwl AlmnTqp AlAxrY.... AxbAr Tybp HqA. lknhA lyst nhA}yp. fAlmnTqp AlErbyp، ElY rgm Aljhwd AlrAhnp، lA tzAl ErDp lAntkAsAt qd tjElhA txsr frSp AlEwlmp wmA bEd AlHdAvp، tmAmA kmA xsrt AlY Hd kbyr mErkp AlHdAvp. kyf؟ lmA*A؟

nmw*j En AlHyAp AlfytnAmyp wAlEAlm AlfytnAmy ErfnAh fy AyAm mDt mn fytnAmyyn AtwA AlY lbnAn ly$ArkwA fy AEmAl AljmEyp AlEmwmyp AlvAnyp E$rp lrAbTp AljAmEAt AlnATqp klyAF Aw jz}yAF bAllgp Alfrnsyp - Awblf wjAmEp $bkAt AltwASl Alfrnsyp - Awryf Alty tEqd fy qSr AlAwnyskw. ElY r>s Alwfd nA}bp r}ys jmhwryp fytnAm AlA$trAkyp Alsydp ty bn ngwyAn Alty AETt AlnhAr HdyvAF xASAF. En Alfrnkwfwnyp wAltHdyAt Alty twAjhhA AwDHt Alsydp ngwyAn AhmythA wAltEddyp AlvqAfyp wAltbAdl AlHDAry AlvqAfy. wEn lbnAn wAlElAqAt AlvnA}yp byn Albldyn، EAdt ngwyAn bAl*Akrp AlY mA qbl AlHrb AlAhlyp AllbnAnyp tAryx zyArthA byrwt Alty AHbt wAllbnAnyyn Al*yn r>t fyhm $y}AF mn Al$Eb AlfytnAmy AlTyb، AlSAfy Alqlb wAlmtsAmH، dwn An tnsY dEwthm lmqAwmp AlAHtlAl bmxtlf A$kAlh wAlmvAbrp ElY AlmqAwmp mn Ajl AlwHdp AlwTnyp wAlslAm AldA}m. kmA An AlnZAm AlAHAdy AlqTb Al*y twjhh AlwlAyAt AlmtHdp lA ynjH dA}mAF fy frD syAsAth ElY AlEAlm l>n mEZm Al$Ewb ASbHt tdrk mEnY Al$Ewr bAlsyAdp wAlHryp. & EAm 1997 AnEqdt Alqmp Alfrnkwfwnyp AlsAbEp fy fytnAm، mA hy TbyEp AlElAqAt AlqA}mp byn fytnAm wAlfrnkwfwnyp؟ - AEtqd An AlElAqp byn fytnAm wAlfrnkwfwnyp tEwd AlY zmn bEyd. $ArknA fy Alhy}p AlAwlY llfrnkwfwnyp Al_ (wkAlp AltEAwn AlvqAfy wAltqny) EAm 1969، kmA $ArknA fy mjAlAt AxrY. fhnAk Alqmp wAlm&tmr AlwzAry wAlljnp AldA}mp . wnHn mn* AlbdAyAt mE Alfrnkwfwnyp. & hl Alfrnkwfwnyp hy AlmnZmp Alty twAjh AlESr AlAmyrky AlsA}d fy AlEAlm؟ - AEtqd Anh mE fkrp tnZym Alhy}p mn* AlEAm AlmADy wmE wjwd Edd mEyn mn Aldwl AlnATqp bAlfrnsyp Aw Alty EA$t fy Zl AlAstEmAr Alfrnsy Aw nsbp AlY rwAbT tAryxyp، hnAk AtjAh fy AlEAlm lltwHd mn Ajl Alnmw wAltTwr. wAZn An Alfkrp tnbE mn hnA wAn Aldwl Alty tjmEhA Allgp Alfrnsyp tryd tHdyd hdf AltEAwn AlvqAfy AlY tbAdl vqAfy wmElwmAt mE Alm&ssAt Alty ttHdv Alfrnsyp. kmA AnnA wsEnA h*A AlATAr mn AltEAwn wfy Alqmp AlsAbqp twSlnA AlY Drwrp AqAmp ElAqAt tEAwn kAmlp w$Amlp، Ay AlY jAnb AltEAwn AlsyAsy wAlvqAfy wAllgwy wAlElmy yjb AqAmp ElAqp tEAwn AqtSAdy mE mxtlf Aldwl wHtY Aldwl AlmtTwrp Alty lA tzAl tEAny m$Akl nmw، lA symA An Aglbyp Aldwl AlAEDA' hy mn Aldwl AlnAmyp Aw fy Twr Alnmw. wh*A sbb |xr lHAjthA AlY AltEAwn. & AlA ywjd nwE mn AltnAfs Alfrnkwfwny - AlAnklwfwny، lA symA AlAmyrky Al*y ynt$r AsrE fy AlEAlm؟ - fy fytnAm، mn* Amd bEyd nstxdm Allgp Alfrnsyp lAn ldynA ElAqAt mmyzp bfrnsA wjz'AF kbyr mn Al$Eb AlfytnAmy yErf Alfrnsyp. lkn fymA bEd wnZrAF AlY AlAHdAv AltAryxyp mn AlHrb AlY ElAqAtnA bAlAtHAd AlswfyAty AlsAbq wAlSyn، wfy AlsnwAt AlAxyrp h*h AqmnA ElAqAt tEAwn mE dwl |syA wAldwl Algrbyp، wh*A ysAEd tElm AllgAt xASp Alfrnsyp. Al|n، AEtqd An AlnAs Al*yn yErfwn AlAnklyzyp hm Akvr wlA ymknnA Alqwl An hnAk SrAEAF byn AlAvntyn bl Anh tnAfs byn AllgAt. wh*h AllgAt wtTwrhA tfrDhA mSlHp AltEAwn byn Aldwl. mvlAF fy fytnAm nHb Allgp Alfrnsyp klgp vqAfp wlh*A Alsbb HtY Al*yn ytHdvwn AlAnklyzyp ytElmwn Alfrnsyp lytErfwA AlY Alqym AlvqAfyp Alfrnsyp. AlY jAnb h*A، nHtAj AlY mErfp AlAnklyzyp wAstEmAlhA fhy lgp AlAEmAl EAlmyAF. wAlywm AlAtjAh hw AltEddyp Allgwyp wEndnA Al$bAb AlfytnAmywn ytHdvwn lgtyn Aw vlAvAF. AltHdyAt & mA hy AltHdyAt Alty twAjhhA Alfrnkwfwnyp Alywm؟ - nEy$ fy EAlm Hyv mywl Edp ElY AlSEyd AlsyAsy kmA ElY AlSEyd AlAqtSAdy. fy r>yy An Alfrnkwfwnyp twAjh bED AlAxtbArAt A*A AtbEt syAsp mbA$rp stErf kyf ttTwr. lmA*A Aqwl h*A؟ l>n AlEAlm Alfrnsy hw jz' mn AlmjtmE Aldwly Al*y ytjh AlY AltwHd An ElY AlSEyd AlsyAsy kmA ElY AlSEyd AlAqtSAdy. AEtqd An Alfrnkwfwnyp lA tstTyE Altqdm bl fy AmkAnhA Alnmw wAltwsE Akvr wAldlyl ElY *lk An Edd Aldwl AlAEDA' EAm 1996 tDAEf AlY 52 wkAn 42 EDwAF. whnAk dwl AxrY ymknhA AlAntsAb AlY AlmnZmp. & fytnAm dwlp A$trAkyp wAlfrnkwfwnyp tdEw AlY AltEddyp AlvqAfyp، fkyf lA ttEArD mE mbAd} AlA$trAkyp؟ - AbdAF. AnA Atklm En AlvqAfp wmA ygny AlvqAfp AlwTnyp. wsyAstnA AlvqAfyp trtkz ElY AlHfAZ ElY Alqym AlvqAfyp AlwTnyp. fy Alwqt nfsh ngtny bAlqym AlvqAfyp AlAxrY. j*wrkm & Ay Ankm tHAfZwn ElY j*wrkm mE AlAnftAH ElY HDArAt AxrY dwn AlsEy AlY tqlydhA؟ - TbEAF lA، ElynA AwlAF An nkwn AnfsnA wElynA AlHfAZ ElY vqAftnA AlwTnyp wmHAwlp tTwyrhA wAgnA}hA، wngtny AyDAF mn vqAfAt AxrY kAlvqAfp AlSynyp Alty AfdnA mnhA kvyrAF. k*lk AlAmr llvqAfp Alfrnsyp wAlrwsyp AlY Hd mA. A*n AlAfAdp wAltElm mn vqAfAt AxrY lA ElAqp lhA bAlA$trAkyp. mA hy AlA$trAkyp ASlA؟ hy An$A' mjtmE Hyv Al$Eb kAfp ystTyE AltmtE bHq AlmsAwAp wAlrfAh wAlEdAlp wnHn nHArb lh*h AlmbAd} wh*A Amr SEb lknnA lA nrfD Aw nEArD |rA' AlAxryn. & lnEd AlY Aldwr Al*y lEbth Alfrnkwfwnyp fy AlvqAfp wAlHDArp AlfytnAmyp؟ - ly، AlvqAfp AlwTnyp AlfytnAmyp hy ml>Y bAlAnsAnyp wElY h*A AlmstwY nltqy wAlvqAfp Alfrnsyp. tElmyn tAryx frnsA mn* Alvwrp Alfrnsyp EAm 1789 AlY Alywm wAdbA}hA kjAn - jAk rwsw wfyktwr hwgw، kmA AlmbAd} Alfrnsyp: AlHryp wAlmsAwAp wAlAxwp rbmA nltqy mEhm ElY h*A AlmstwY wnt>vr bhm AlY Hd mA wnHfZ mA n>x* mn Al|xryn. AlwlAyAt AlmtHdp & ASbH AlEAlm Alywm AHAdy AlqTb twjhh AlwlAyAt AlmtHdp fy mxtlf EAdAthA wtqAlydhA. fy Zl h*A Aljw AlEAlmy >mA zlt tEtqdyn bHtmyp AntSAr AlA$trAkyp؟ - sAbqAF kAn hnAk qwtAn EAlmytAn AlwlAyAt AlmtHdp mn jhp wAlAtHAd AlswfyAty mn jhp AxrY. hl tEtqdyn An AlwlAyAt AlmtHdp HAlyAF tstTyE fEl mA t$A'؟ rbmA yrydwn tTbyq syAsAthm wlkn hl fy AmkAnhm؟ lA >Etqd *lk. fy r>yy، ymknnA AlEwdp AlY Al$Eb lrfD wAqE mA. mn* Eqwd wAl$Ewb lAsymA AlAsywyp wAlAfryqyp tEy HqwqhA tjAh mSyrhA wAstqlAlhA. qbl AlstynAt، mEZm Aldwl kAnt mstEmrp bEd h*h Alftrp Erft AlHryp wAl$Ewr bAlsyAdp wAlHq fy tqryr mSyrhA، wh*h dwAfE AEtzAz. wAlsyAsp AlAmyrkyp wAn kAnt tryd frD syAsAthA ElY Aldwl ln ttmkn. l>nhA tdrk tmAmAF An hnAk $EwbAF tHArb wtdAfE En HryAthA. wmvAl ElY *lk fytnAm، wAl$Eb AlfytnAmy fqyr wrgm *lk qAwm bqwp Alwjwd AlAmyrky AlY An ADTrt AlwlAyAt AlmtHdp AlY sHb qwAthA wAslHthA lAsymA bEd mA Zhr dEm dwly qwy lfytnAm. & lkn fy AmAkn AxrY mn AlEAlm tstmr AlwlAyAt AlmtHdp fy frD syAsthA، wh*A wADH mn xlAl mA yHSl ltTbyq AlqrAr 425 Al*y yqDy bAnsHAb AlAsrA}ylyyn mn jnwb lbnAn wAlwlAyAt AlmtHdp tvAbr mn* zmn AlAHtlAl ElY dEm AlAsrA}ylyyn. - wAn frDt syAsthA fy AlnhAyp lA AEtqd AnhA sttmkn mn fEl mA tryd. Alm$klp hy Anh yjb AltElm kyfyp AlAstqlAl wlAsymA EndmA lA ykwn $Eb mA qwyAF mn nAHyp AltslH wAlmwArd AlTbyEyp AldAxlyp DEyfp، yjb AwlAF tHqyq AlwHdp AlwTnyp vm AldEm Aldwly wyjb AlmvAbrp fy dEm AlqDyp wnSrhA. wA*A vAbrtm mn Alm&kd Ankm stHqqwn mrAdkm. & mA hw mwqf AlHkwmp AlfytnAmyp mn AlAHtlAl AlAsrA}yly wAnk *krt fy xTAbk Ank tElmyn mEAnAp Al$Eb AllbnAny؟ - nHn mE AltTbyq AlSArm llqrAr 425 kmA AlqrArAt AlAxrY Alty tqDy bAnsHAb Aljyw$ AlAjnbyp kAfp mn lbnAn، wElykm AlAstmrAr fy mHArbp AlZlm wAlAHtlAl. & mA hy m$AryE AltEAwn bynkm wbyn AlHkwmp AllbnAnyp؟ >ndrAws ndY

A*A lm yTr> TAr} stkwn Aljwlp AlHAlyp lzEym Hrkp HmAs Al$yx AHmd yAsyn، jwlp Twylp. fbEd zyArth AlsEwdyp wbED dwl Alxlyj، wbEd An ynhy lqA'Ath fy ThrAn Alty wSl AlyhA Ams AlAwl، st$ml Aljwlp dwlA mvl mAlyzyA wjnwb AfryqyA Alty tlqY dEwp $xSyp mn Alr}ys nlswn mAndylA lzyArthA. wfy Tryq AlEwdp syzwr swryA wrbmA AlErAq. wlys wADHA HtY AlAn hl ykwn AlArdn mHTth AlAxyrp qbl AlEwdp AlY gzp، Am symr bAlqAhrp Alty kAnt mHTth AlAwlY، rgm AnhA lm ttHwl AlY zyArp rsmyp mElnp. AlqAhrp mn* AEwAm tmyz bwDwH byn mwqfhA mn bED AltyArAt AlASwlyp AlmSryp AlmslHp wgyr AlmslHp wmwqfhA mn HmAs. fAlAtSAlAt byn HmAs wAlHkwmp AlmSryp mtwASlp. lAn AlAxyrp، fy mnAx HrShA ElY AETA' AlAhmyp ldwrhA AlErby fy AlEqd AlAxyr، tEtbr Al$>n AlflsTyny bkAmlh mjAlA lAhtmAmhA. wlh*A، wrgm An yAsr ErfAt hw wrqthA AlAwlY bdwn trdd dAxl flsTyn - wfy AlmqAbl hw yEtbrhA mrjEyth AlAqlymyp AlwHydp fElA، xSwSA bEd AlAqAmp fy gzp - rgm *lk fqd AnftHt AlqAhrp ElY kl AlfSA}l AlflsTynyp AlAxrY wldyhA qnwAt AtSAl wt$Awr dwryp mEhA، wbSwrp xASp ElY HmAs. AlA An ThrAn tErf An Alqwp AlAslAmyp fy Al$ArE AlflsTyny hy qwp HmAs، fymA Hrkp AljhAd AlAslAmy hy qwp nxbwyp kmA yqwl bED AlmSAdr AlflsTynyp. wh*A lA yHtAj AlY kbyr AvbAt. mE swryA، AlElAqAt qwyp wmElnp. AlA AnhA lyst rsmyp. bmEnY Anh lA tHrk rsmy lmmvly HmAs fy AlEASmp Alswryp، Ay lyst h*h AlEASmp mkAn An$Tp syAsyp mE gyr Alms&wlyn Alswryyn. fmktb AlHrkp fy dm$q lA y$hd lqA'At mElnp Aw rsmyp mE Erb wAjAnb rsmyyn HtY EndmA yTlb h&lA' *lk. wt*k~ir mSAdr HmAs An AlElAqp mE dm$q tTwrt EndmA smHt AsrA}yl bEwdp ArbEm}p mn AlmbEdyn AlY mrj Alzhwr fy lbnAn wrfDt Ewdp 17 mbEdA، h&lA' AstDAfhm Alr}ys HAfZ AlAsd wmnHhm bywtA wrwAtb fy swryA bEdmA AEt*rt AlslTAt AllbnAnyp En Edm qbwl bqA}hm fy lbnAn. HmAs twly ElAqAthA AlErbyp wAldwlyp Ahmyp kbyrp. why lA tbny h*h AlElAqAt ElY AsAs Aydywlwjy، wlElhA fy h*A AlmjAl tstfyd mn tjrbp ftH fy snwAt mA qbl Awslw، HtY mE dwl mvl bryTAnyA ldyhA qnwAt AtSAl dwryp، wAn kAnt mSAdr HmAs tSf h*h AlqnwAt b>nhA Amnyp wlm tSbH syAsyp bEd bAlmEnY Alrsmy، lAn AlmrAjE AlbryTAnyp hy Alty AxtArt h*h AlSygp HtY Al|n، bl An mSAdr HmAs tqwl Anh HtY Al$xS AlHmAsy Al*y yqwm bAlAtSAlAt fy lndn lm tEynh AlHrkp bqdr mA jA't bh AlAjhzp AlbryTAnyp، bmA y$bh Altwqyf fy AlmrHlp AlAwlY lAnh yEy$ fy lndn wtHw~lt AlElAqp mEh mn tHqyq AlY t$Awr bHyv An AlAjhzp AlbryTAnyp tstdEyh EndmA tjd mn AlmnAsb *lk، wxSwSAF fy mA ytElq bhwAjshA AlAmnyp fy bryTAnyA nfshA! bAlTbE lkl mn h*h Aldwl HsAbAthA، why Alty tqrr fy Alntyjp mstwY AlElAqp mE HmAs. An AlEAlm qlq ElynA lAnnA AvbtnA An AlwTn AlSgyr kmA tmkn mn Hml m$El AlvqAfp wAlHDArp rdHA TwylA mn Aldhr، k*lk ymknh An ySbH mSdr Al$rwr wAlAxTAr wAn yqD AlmDAjE. wAdrk AlEAlm An h*A AlmwATn Al*y kAn yrAh ydxl wHdh fy EAlm Almjhwl fynsjm wytjAwb wybny k*lk tmkn An y$hd qlp mnHrfp ttnkr wtrfD wtHTm. fmA*A yxtAr wmA*A nxtAr AyhA AlAxwp؟ yA AyhA AlmHtflwn bmylAd Alsyd، wyA AyhA Almkrmwn ll$hyd؟ AmAm h*A AlxyAr AlwADH Al*y lA ntrdd fyh lHZp wAstmrArA ltAryxnA AlHDAry AlbnA' wmE AjwA' Al*kryAt Alty nqdshA، ElynA: AwlA: An nxrj mn AjwA' AlHrb fwrA، fAnhA lm tkn bAlmdAfE fqT bl kAnt HrbA bAlEqwl wAlnfws wAlAlsn AyDA. lqd AbdEt AlEqwl mE AlAsf fy AbtkAr AlxTT Aljhnmyp، wfy AstEmAl AlwsA}l AlmHrDp wAlmHTp، wfy tnZyr AlAnHrAfAt wAlmZAlm wtbryrhA HtY lm ybq AmAm bEDnA Eml gyr mbrr mhmA kAn bEydA En AlmbAd} AlAnsAnyp wEn AltqAlyd AllbnAnyp. wt$njt Alnfws fkrht kmA lA ymkn An ykrh، wqd knA fy tAryxnA m&ssy AlrHmp mE AlAEdA' wAlHmAyp llAj}yn wAlHfZ llATfAl wAlnsA' wAljrHY wAn >lsnp AlEAlm lA tzAl tnql kyf knA nbEv AlATbA' fy AlHrb ljrHY AlAEdA' qbl An twjd m&ssAt AlSlyb AlAHmr fy AlEAlm wt&kd An AlA$jAr wAlAbryA' wAlHywAnAt HtY، kAnt ttTlb AltfAny mnA. AmA AlAlsnp wAlAqlAm fqd xADt HrbA tjAwzt fy $rAsthA AlAslHp AlftAkp، fAxtlqt w$wht wHbbt wkrht wDxmt wSgrt wHTmt wtjAwzt Hdwd AfkAr gwblz. An AlHrb AllbnAnyp ymkn AEtbArhA AlHrb AlAElAmyp AwlA، wntjt En h*A Alt$nj AlAElAmy Al*y Srft lh AlmlAyyn bl m}At AlmlAyyn wAl*y tjndt lh AlAfkAr wAlmwAhb، ntjt En h*A Hrb AlEqwl wAlnfws w>dY kl *lk AlY Hrb AlAydy wAlslAH wAlY Alm|sy wAlkArvp. l*lk fAn AldmAr Alnfsy fy AlwTn fAq AldmAr AlmAdy wtjAwz AlDHAyA wAljrHY mmA yjEl AmAm AlqAdp wAlmfkryn mhAm~a jdydp wjsymp tfwq mhAmhm bEd AlHrwb AlSgrY Alkwnyp. wlAHZ AlHsyn (E) An tDHyp kbrY tEAdl jsAmp AlmHnp wHdhA ttmkn mn tfjyr ynAbyE Alxyr fy Dmyr AlAmp، flm ytrdd sAEp wAHdp wwDE rwHh fy kfh wHml mEh kl mn lh wkl mAlh wq*f bjmyE *lk AlY mvl h*A Alywm، fy nyrAn AlZlm wAlZlAm AlmstErp fAHtrq bhA wlknh ATf>hA f>Dy' bh*h Al$mwE AlTAhrp lyl AlmjtmE AlTwyl wATl Alfjr. lqd wjd AlHsyn An AlHq lA yEml bh wAn AlbATl lA ytnAhY Enh wAn AlHAkm ytmAdY fy AgtSAb Hqwq AlnAs wystEml fy tnfy* *lk syfhm wAbnA'hm. wAnh ystEbd AlAnsAn wyjrh AlY t>myn AlmSAlH Al*Atyp wAnh y$try AlAlsn wysxr AlAfkAr wy$wh AlHqA}q wyjt*b Alqlwb، vm ytSrf fy h*h AlmzrEp dwn mnAzE wlA rAdE، ysfk wyhtk wydmr wyrHl wyHwl AlAnsAn AlHr Al$ryf AlY Al|lp AlTyEp، whA hw ywrv slTAnh wyxld mlkh wyfrD AlbyEp lAbnA}h. wAxTr mA fy AlAmr Anh ystEyn bAldyn AlAlhy wbm&ssAth wb$EA}rh wb>HkAmh fySbg tSrfAth wmxAlfAth bAl$ryEp wAl$rEyp wyEtbr ATAEp Amrh fryDp، wmxAlfp AhwA}h mrwqA wysl syf Aldyn lqtl Alm&mnyn AlAHrAr bEd An yjEl mnhm bHkm AlqDAp wAHAdyv AlrwAp wmwAEZ AldEAp، xwArj mrtdyn، fA*A bAlAnsAn Al*y TAlmA tTlE AlY AlsmA' wnADl fy trsyx qwAEd Aldyn، wwDE AmAlh AlkbrY fy AlHryp wAlkrAmp wAlAmAn wAlEy$ AlTAhr AmAnp byd qAdth، A* bh yfAj> b>n AEdA' Hryth wkrAmth wmgtSby Hqwqh wAmAnyh، hm Al*yn yHkmwnh wy&mwnh wyqrrwn mSyrh. AmA AlnAs Awl}k Al*yn rbAhm mHmd ElY AlA yqArwA ElY kZp ZAlm wlA ElY sgb mZlwm wAlA ysktwA ElY AlAnHrAf mhmA kAn SgyrA، Awl}k Al*yn ml>t AHtjAjAthm mjAls AlHkAm wAndyp AlmjtmE، hA hm AsrY Alsyf Aw Alrgyf Aw AltHryf whA bEDhm yqwlwn llHsyn: An qlwbnA mEk wsywfnA Elyk. bEd An Tlb AlmtHkm fy mdynp Alrswl mnh mbAyEp yzyd. wxrj mn Almdynp ElY ArAdp AlHkAm wAlAstslAm mhAjrA AlY Allh AlHq، vm trk mkp fy mwsm AlHj bAl*At AmEAnA fy AlAHtjAj wAtmAmA lltHdy، mElnA ElY r&ws AlA$hAd rfDh lkl mA yjry fy AlEAlm AlAslAmy wlkl mn yjry wrA' AlTwAgyt wAlmnHrfyn m&kdA An AlHj wAlm&ssAt Aldynyp klhA hy lHmAyp AlAnsAn wkrAmth wltHryrh wmErAjh wltrbyth wsmwh wAlA fAlrHlp AlHqyqyp AlY Allh، hy AlY AlmkAn Al*y ttwAfr fyh Alqym AlrwHyp wlw kAn Ebr AlSHrA' AlY mqAm Al$hAdp fy sbyl Allh. xrj AlHsyn (E) mn mkp AlY AlSHrA' qA}lA: xT Almwt ElY wld |dm mxT AlqlAdp ElY jyd AlftAp wmA Awlhny AlY AslAfy A$tyAq yEqwb AlY ywsf. wk>ny bAwSAly tqTEhA EslAn AlglwAt byn AlnwAwys wkrblA' fyml>n mny AkrA$A jwfA' wAjrbp sgbA'. vm ynhy xTbth Al$hyrp bqwlh: Any lA >rY Almwt AlA sEAdp wlA AlHyAp mE AlZAlmyn AlA brmA AlA wmn kAn mnkm bA*lA mhjth mt$wqA AlY lqA' Allh flyrHl mEnA. vm *hb flAqY mSrEh wmSArE Ahlh wASHAbh jmyEA. wml> msAmE AlEAlm xbr Ast$hAdh wTnyn $EArAth wbryq bTwlAth wjrA}m AEdA}h، wbd>t AlAHtjAjAt wAlndwAt wAltwbAt wAlvwrAt tgTy ArjA' AlEAlm AlAslAmy fhzt Erw$ AlZAlmyn wAsqTt kyAn AlmnHrfyn wAmtdt Al$Elp AlAnsAnyp AlTAhrp Alty AwqdhA Allh bdmA}hm AlY >fq Aldhr wAltAryx. wfy h*h Alsnp، wfy kl snp tqtrn bdAyp Alsnp Alhjryp hjrp mHmd، mE *krY Alhjrp AlHsynyp AqtrAn AlbdAyp bAlAstmrAr wAnsjAm Alj*wr bAlAgSAn wAlAss bAlbnA'. wbnfs Alqwp wAlAbdAE wElY qdr AlAbtkArAt Almdh$p، ElynA An nEAlj HAlp AlHrb، wAn nxrj mnhA bml' ArAdtnA wbkAml HrytnA. An qwAt AlAmn AlErbyp AlmEzzp lA ttmkn mn An tdxl fy h*h AlsAHAt AlkbrY fy HrbnA wlA yEAljhA AlA EzmnA AlnAbE mn <lhAm AlfAdy wfdA' AlHsyn wAlA ArAdtnA AlSlbp lbnA' mstqblnA wmstqbl AwlAdnA. ElynA An nEyd AlnZr fy AlmElwmAt Alty AETyt lmA qbyl AlHrb wxlAlhA wtAlyA nEyd tqwymnA fy AlElAqAt AlEAmp wAlxASp wfy AxtyAr AlHlyf wAlxSm wfy AntxAb AlqAdp wAlrfAq. ElynA An ntjdd kAlsnp Aljdydp hjryp wmylAdyp wqd tjddtA mEA fntjdd bEqwlnA wnfwsnA wmElwmAtnA wAHAdyvnA Almjlsyp wAlSHAfyp wAlEAmp. AnnA A*A ArdnA An nqrr mSyrnA bAnfsnA wAn nmlk AlzmAm mn jdyd ElynA An ntjh bkl mA lwjwdnA mn AbEAd AlY AlbnA'، AlY AlAmAm، AlY Alxlwd، wAlA fAn AlEAlm yEtbrnA wldA EAqA yqATEnA wytgADY EmA yHl bnA mn kwArv wyDE mHjrA ElY Hdwdh ldxwlnA. fyA AyhA AllbnAnywn AlTybwn، EAljwA AlmHnp qbl An tstESy ElY AlElAj wAbd>wA fwrA wdwn t>xyr bAlxrwj mn AjwA' AlHrb fy EqwlnA wfy nfwsnA، fy HlqAtnA wlqA'AtnA AlxASp wAlEAmp، wlnbAdr AlY mnE bqAyA Althdyd wAlxTf wAlnsf wAltHryD wAltbjH wAltHdy wbyE AlmsrwqAt ElnAF. wlnstEjl dwn AlTlb bATlAq srAH AlmEtqlyn lyEwdwA AlY bywthm wAlY *wyhm Al*yn TAl AntZArhm wtEbt Eywnhm mtjhp nHw AlAbwAb. lntjnb tbryr kl AnHrAf bAsnAdh AlY EnASr gyr mnDbTp Aw bHjp AlmqAblp bAlmvl wbmxtlf AlHjj wAlAE*Ar wAlflsfAt Alty tbtkrhA EqwlnA AlnwAbg. wyA bnAp AlAwTAn wAltAryx، A$jbwA ElnA kl AnHrAf HSl Aw yHSl wqATEwA kl ZAlm AvnA' AlmHnp wbEdhA، wlA tHAwlwA AlHkm Elyh mn mnTq ArtbAT mrtkbyh mEkm، fbAlEdl wAlEdl wHdh tbnY AlAwTAn، AlEdl fy Alslwk wfy AlHkm wAlqwl، wbAlEdl ySnE AltAryx. AyhA AlAxwp AlmwATnwn، An mbAdrtnA AlEAmp Al$Amlp fy AnhA' AlHrb wAjwA}hA txrjnA mn AlHAjp AlY Alqymyn wlw kAnwA Axwp lnA، wtwfr ElynA Alm$Aq wAlAxTAr wtjElhm ytfrgwn lms&wlyAthm AlwTnyp wAlqwmyp Alty tntZrhm. An AsrAEnA fy bnA' m&ssAtnA AlwTnyp hw wAjb wTny wqwmy fy |n mEAF. wmn dwn m$ArktnA fy Trd AlHrb wAvArhA، nErD wTnnA w>mtnA lAxTAr kbrY >thyb mn *krhA fkyf A*A HAwlnA tmdyd AjwA' AlHrb b$kl Aw |xr. AEwd، AmAm vql Alms&wlyp wSEwbp tHmlhA، wAlHrb qd tEmqt، AEwd wA*krkm bAlmylAd Almjyd llfAdy wmEAnyh wAbEAdhA wnHn nHtfl bh wnkrmh، w>DE AmAm Eynkm Ast$hAd AlHsyn wAEmAqh wnHn nEy$ AHtfAlAth wmEAnyh. hlmwA yA AyhA AlAxwp lnEml AHAdA wjmAEAt، nbAdr AlY tSfyp *ywl AlHrb fy xlq AlmSAlHAt wxrq AlAjwA' AlSEbp fy AyjAd AlHwAr fy AlbHv AlmHb، fy tqryr AlmSyr wAltfkyr bh. AyhA AllbnAnywn: tEAlwA ntHdY AlEAlm، AlSdyq Al*y rAhn b>lm ElY nhAytnA wAlEdw Al*y t|mr ElY wTnnA wElY wHdth Aw ElY syAdth Aw ElY Hryth Aw ElY AnftAHh Aw ElY TmwHh Aw ElY AzdhArh Aw ElY kl *lk mEA. ntHdAhm jmyEA wnqwl lhm bAlfEl lA bAlAdEA' AnnA hnA bAqwn، SAmdwn، mstmrwn، nHfZ wTnnA: wHdth wsyAdth wHryth wAnftAHh wAzdhArh. yA AyhA AlEAlm Al*y sAhmnA fy tvqyfh wfy tHDyrh wfy bnA}h، wfy AldfAE En AlmZlwmyn fy Ay bqEp mnh، wAl*y sArEnA fy tbny qDAyAh، wAl*y ftHnA EqwlnA wqlwbnA wbywtnA wm&ssAtnA wSHfnA lh، AnnA hnA lA nzAl rgm AsA'Atk wtjAhlk wHznk Almtrf ElynA wmHAsbAtk AlAqtSAdyp wAlsyAsyp fy AsEAfnA wmsAEdtnA، AnnA mwjwdwn mwHdwn mstEdwn llbqA' fy nfs AlmwqE AlmETA' wsnDmd jrwHnA lntfrg ltDmyd jrwHk wsnbEd AlZlm En dAxlnA lky nHArb AlZlm ldyk wsnqDy ElY Altxlf wAlEnSryp wAltmyyz lky nqf lxdmp AlmtET$yn AlY Altqdm wAlmsAwAp wAlHryp. wyA AyhA AlEAlm Al*y AnzEjt mn Ant$Ar wjwdnA wEmq t>vyr AbnA}nA، fmn tbnynA lqDyp flsTyn wlnDAl $EbhA AlEAdl، wmn AlqA}nA lklmp flsTyn fy AlAmm AlmtHdp، wmn HmAytnA lvwrthA wlvwArhA wlmkAtbhm wlmxymAthm، AnnA rgm mEAnAtnA Alty tjAwzt kl Hd، bAqwn fy *At AlmwqE wswf ntEAwn mEhm fy AEAdp Altqwym lmrHlp vwrthm Almqblp wfy wDE AstrAtyjyA jdydp lhA wfy HmAyp qDythm AlEAdlp AlY ywm AlEwdp. An Alqds Alty hy EASmp bldhm hy qbltnA wmltqY qymnA wtjsyd wHdtnA wmErAj rsAltnA، AnhA qdsnA wqDytnA، wjhAdhm fy sbyl tHryrhA jhAdnA wms&wlytnA. An wTnnA >qwY $kymp wAwsE >fqAF mn An yt>vr bAljrwH AlmftElp، wAn AlSEwbAt Alty tEtrDnA hy Aql mn An tslb rsAltnA AlHDAryp wms&wlytnA AltAryxyp. wyA AyhA Al*y Ardt AlqDA' ElY tEAy$nA AlmvAly lky lA y$k~l bwjwdnA sndA HyA qrybA lAdAntk، yA AsrA}yl، AElmy AnnA qblnA AmAnp Allh wAmAnp AlAnsAn Alty hy wHdtnA AlwTnyp Al$Amlp llmsyHyyn wAlmslmyn، qblnAhA wHdnA byn blAd Allh klhA، wknA nErf SEwbAthA wms&wlyAthA، wb*lk ASbHnA mwDE |mAl AlEAlm wmvAlA mtjsdA lmstqblh wwAHp nmw*jyp lHDArth Almstqblyp، kmA ksbnA b*lk rDA rbnA، wdAfEnA En dynh AmAm AlAthAmAt Almwjhp AlY rsAlAth، wswf nbqY mtmskyn btEAy$nA، AmnA' ElY AlAmAnp AlgAlyp ndAfE EnhA bkl mA nmlk mn qwp fkryp wEATfyp wdfAEyp. wlA nsmH llfkr AlShywny، wAlnAzy Aw AlfA$y Aw AlEnSry An ynmw fy wTnnA kmA lA nsmH llfkr AlEnSry Aljdyd Almtlbs bgTA' bED AlAHzAb An ynt$r byn AbnA}nA. wyA dEAp AlAlHAd wmthmy AlAymAn wyA AyhA AlTAmEwn fy ArD wTny AlrAfEwn $EArAt syAsyp wEqA}dyp، ft$wA En qAEdp lkm AxrY، flbnAnnA ArD Allh wAlAnsAn، w lA mkAn fyh lmnkry Allh wlmtnkryh wlA lmHtqry AlAnsAn wmSnfyh. wyA AyhA AltAryx، lqd HmynA fy mwAqE mtEddp wmtnAqDp AHyAnA، bdmA}nA wbsxA'، HmynA wTnnA wwHdth wsyAdth، wTrdnA Alfkrp Alty kAnt tEtbrnA tjAr AlwTn Aw AlmjtmE Almrkntyly، wl*lk fAn sjlnA ldyk qd Aktml wAnnA ktbnA ElY SfHAtk Alxlwd bdmA' $hdA}nA AlAbrAr wAn Almslkyp Alq*rp Alty AstEmlhA AlbED wdfE AlyhA AlbED lA ymkn An t$wh AntfADtnA AlnAbEp mn AlqnAEAt AlsAmyp wsnHAwl bkl dqp wvbAt AEAdp bnA' Alnfsyp ldY AbnA}nA fy Dw' AlAymAn bAllh wAlAltzAm AlkAml bAlqym. AyhA AlmwATnwn: An h*h AlmxATbp llEAlm wlltAryx fy h*h AlsAEAt AlmSyryp tSdr En qlby wlsAny wAnny AHs b>nhmA yEbrAn EmA fy DmA}rkm wsrA}rkm. fqd lAHZt wlAHZ AlEAlm mA wrd ElY lsAn r}ys AlblAd fy jlsp qsmh wAstlAmh. wrd *lk ElY lsAnh wrEwd AlmdAfE kAnt tSm AlA*An، vm tjddt h*h AlmrtkzAt fy AldEA' AlmxlS Al*y Abthl bh smAHp mfty Aljmhwryp bmnAsbp r>s Alsnp Alhjryp wfSlhA blgp wADHp wmnTq slym SAHb AlgbTp AlbTryrk xry$ fy klmth AlmylAdyp AlrA}Ep. wl*lk fAnny lA AEtbr nfsy fy mDAmyn h*h AlmnA$dp $AErA Aw HAlmA wlA wAEZA، AnhA bSmAt Eqwlkm wqlwbkm wAydykm ElY jbyn h*h AljbAl wAl$wAT}، wAnhA xTwT slwkkm Alqdym AlHdyv Ebr AlbHAr AlY AlqArAt Alxms wAnhA mfhwm AHtfAlAtkm Almstmrp bh*h Al*kryAt Almjydp. &&& AyhA AlAxwp AlAEzA': mE h*h AldmEAt >Ezy AlAmhAt wAl|bA' w*wy Al$hdA' wmE h*h AlxfqAt Abthl AlY Allh Alqdyr An yHtDnhm fy ElyA}h whw Aqrb Alyhm mn Ahlhm، wbh*h AlxTrAt Alfkryp AlEATfyp Arsm tfA&ly fy AlSfHp AlAwlY mn Alsnp Aljdydp، wAlY AlAmAm، wAlY AltrfE، wAlY AltEmq، wAlslAm. (rsAlp mwjhp AlY AllbnAnyyn btAryx 10 mHrm 1397 h_. AlmwAfq 31-12 1976).

HsnA fEl Alr}ys AllbnAny AlyAs AlhrAwy bdEwth Almlwk wAlr&sA' AlErb fy qmp AlqAhrp Alty Eqdt fy 23 HzyrAn 1996 ldEm Altjdyd lldktwr bTrs gAly lwlAyp vAnyp k>myn EAm ll>mm AlmtHdp، wHsnA fEl AlzEmA' AlErb bAltjAwb bAlAjmAE mE AlAqtrAH AllbnAny، bEdmA kAn Alr}ys AlmSry mHmd Hsny mbArk AvAr mwDwE tr$yHh fy Aljlsp AlxtAmyp llqmp. ln ntnAwl Al|n kl mA yrtbT bmwqf bTrs gAly mn n$r Altqryr AlnhA}y En mjzrp qAnA. fmA yhmnA qwlh hnA hw An h*A Almwqf AlbArz wAlmhm jdA lldktwr gAly lm ykn Almwqf AlAyjAby AlwHyd Al*y Atx*h tjAh qDAyA lbnAn. wswf nrkz hnA ElY qDAyA lbnAnyp، dwn gyrhA، n$>t xlAl Alftrp Almmtdp mn AlEAm 1977 wHtY Alywm. TbEA lA ymkn Altmyyz bshwlp byn bED AlqDAyA AllbnAnyp wAlErbyp، A* lkl mnhA buEd wTny wbuEd Erby fy Alwqt nfsh، wfy bED AlAHyAn Aqlymy wdwly. mwAqf Aldktwr gAly mn qDAyA lbnAnyp 1- rsAlp lbnAn wdwrh AlHDAry Almtmyz: y&mn Aldktwr gAly An lbnAn rsAlp fy AlEAlm AlErby y&dyhA mn* qyAm jAmEp Aldwl AlErbyp fy AlEAm 1945 (1). wxlAl AlHrb AlEbvyp Almjnwnp، HD Aldktwr gAly AllbnAnyyn mrArA ElY AlEml lwqf Alftnp Alty ESft bwTnhm wtHqyq AlmSAlHp AlwTnyp، HtY ytAH lhm Altrkyz ElY Emlyp AlbnA' wAltnmyp، wHtY yEwd lbnAn AlY AdA' dwrh AlErby wAlqwmy wAlvnA}y، Dmn AlAsrp AlErbyp (2) wAwDH An h*A Aldwr hw dwr HDAry mtmyz. wbEd AntxAbh AmynA EAmA llfrnkwfwnyp AErb En dEmh wsrwrh An tkwn qmp Alfrnkwfwnyp AxtArt lbnAn lEqd m&tmr Alqmp AltAsE snp 2001 mEtbrA An *lk y$kl AEtrAfA b>hmyp Aldwl AlErbyp fy Alfrnkwfwnyp wmwqE lbnAn Almhm jdA ElY mftrq AlHDArAt (3). 2- AlHrb AllbnAnyp wdwr AsrA}yl fyhA: EndmA Eyn Aldktwr gAly wzyr dwlp ll$&wn AlxArjyp EAm 1977 kAn lbnAn yEAny mn wylAt AlHrb llsnp AlvAlvp ElY AltwAly. wqd Ebr Aldktwr gAly، $>nh $>n Alkvyr mn kbAr Alms&wlyn AlErb، En Amlh fy An ytwqf nzyf Aldm wAn ystjyb jmyE AlATrAf lmnTq AlslAm wAltEAy$ wAlbEd blbnAn En Altftyt wAltjz}p (4) kmA qAl Avr AstqbAlh r}ys bEvp rEAyp AlmSAlH AllbnAnyp fy AlqAhrp Alsfyr Ebd AlrHmn AlSlH. wAwDH gAly Anh Dd tqsym lbnAn، wmE wHdth wAstqlAlh wslAmp ArADyh، lAn Altqsym lA ymvl xTrA ElY lbn__An fHsb، b__l ElY Aldwl AlErbyp klhA (5). w$dd ElY An AllbnAnyyn qAdrwn ElY Hl m$Aklhm b>nfshm، mqtrHA ElY AlATrAf AlmtSArEp Alljw' AlY AlHwAr wAltfAwD A* Anh bh*h Alwsylp ymkn AlwSwl AlY tswyp slmyp l>SEb Alm$Akl (6). kmA AqtrH t$jyE Aldwl wAljAmEAt wAlmnZmAt ElY AdA' dwr ysAEd ElY AstmrAr AlHwAr wAltfAwD، wADAf: lA bd An AlmjtmE Aldwly yhtm bAlqDyp AllbnAnyp wElyh AlA ynEzl En h*h AlqDyp swA' kAn mn xlAl twSyAt tSdr En mjls AlAmn Aw AljmEyp AlEmwmyp llAmm AlmtHdp Am qrArAt tSdr En AlmjmwEp AlAwrwbyp... (7) wAml An tvmr Aljhwd Almb*wlp xlAl AlHrb fytm AltwSl AlY Sygp llbnAn jdyd، tEyd AlAmn wAlslAm Aly rbwEh. wTAlb bxrwj jmyE Aljyw$ AlAjnbyp mn lbnAn HtY ystTyE An ystrd syAdth kAmlp wElY jmyE ArADyh. wTAlb gAly An ttrkz Aljhwd AlErbyp wAldwlyp fy AlDgT ElY AsrA}yl wfq qrArAt mjls AlAmn، llAnsHAb mn lbnAn، lAn *lk، fy r>yh AlbdAyp Alty tftH AlTryq AmAm tHqyq Al|mAl fy bqA' lbnAn mwHdA، bEydA En AdrAn AlTA}fyp... (8) 3- qrAr mjls AlAmn 425 wAnsHAb AsrA}yl mn lbnAn: mn* AlEAm 1978، tAryx Sdwr AlqrAr Alrqm 425 wHtY Alywm y&kd Aldktwr gAly ElY mTAlbp AsrA}yl btTbyq h*A AlqrAr wAlAnsHAb mn lbnAn. wqd *kr AxyrA An Alfrnkwfwnyp ymknhA An t&dy dwrA fy h*A AlmjAl، A* qAl fy mHADrp AlqAhA fy bArys Al$hr AlmADy، En Alfrnkwfwnyp wAldwl AlErbyp، Anh ydEm kl Aljhwd Alty yb*lhA AlmjtmE Aldwly mn Ajl tTbyq h*A AlqrAr w$dd ElY Anh A*A AstTAEt mnZmp Alfrnkwfwnyp tslyT AlDw' ElY h*A AlqrAr Aldwly wAZhAr mA yEAnyh Al$Eb AllbnAny fy h*h AlmnTqp nkwn HqqnA $y}A mhmA (9). wmyz gAly fy h*A AlATAr byn AlAHtlAl AlAsrA}yly wAlwjwd Alswry Al*y، kmA yrAh، tm bnA' ElY AtfAq byn AlHkwmtyn AllbnAnyp wAlswryp،... whnAk frq byn Alwjwdyn(10). 4- Altjdyd llqwAt Aldwlyp fy Aljnwb AllbnAny rgm mEArDp AsrA}yl: xlAl wlAyth k>myn EAm llAmm AlmtHdp، TAlb gAly fy $kl $bh rwtyny، mjls AlAmn bAltjdyd lqwAt AlTwAr} Aldwlyp AlEAmlp fy Aljnwb. AnmA mn Almhm An n$yr AlY Anh Avr n$rh Altqryr AlSAdr En AlAmm AlmtHdp Hwl mjzrp qAnA wms&wlyp AsrA}yl EnhA، TAlbt AlAxyrp bAEAdp AlnZr fy mhmp h*h AlqwAt. wEndmA s}l gAly fy mjls AlAmn En Eml h*h AlqwAt، kAn jwAbh HAsmA: An Alqwp Alm&qtp fy Aljnwb kAn lhA dwr mhm fy AlmADy wsykwn lhA mvl h*A Aldwr fy Almstqbl k*lk (11). 5- AlmEtqlwn AllbnAnywn fy Alsjwn AlAsrA}ylyp: AbdY Aldktwr gAly AhtmAmA xASA b>wDAE AlmEtqlyn AllbnAnyyn fy Alsjwn AlAsrA}ylyp، fEndmA slmh AlnA}b (Alwzyr HAlyA) b$Arp mrhj، fy mktbh fy AlAmAnp AlEAmp llAmm AlmtHdp، m*krp bAsm ljnp dEm AlmEtqlyn AllbnAnyyn fy Alsjwn AlAsrA}ylyp، wEd gAly bAstdEA' Alsfyr AlAsrA}yly wAblAgh Drwrp mEAljp h*A AlmwDwE Almhm wDrwrp AltHryr Alfwry llsjnA' AllbnAnyyn Al*yn yEAnwn AmrADA mzmnp Aw HAlp tstdEy nqlhm AlY Almst$fY (12). wqd AvAr wzyr xArjyp lbnAn fArs bwyz، h*h AlqDyp mjddA mE AlAmyn AlEAm llAmm AlmtHdp fy ftrp qrybp mn nhAyp wlAyth (t$ryn AlAwl 1996). Avr AlAjtmAE A$Ar bwyz AlY An Ejz Al$rEyp Aldwlyp HyAl AsrA}yl yjEl gAly EAjzA، Al|n ElY AlAql، En mmArsp AlDgT AllAzm ElY AsrA}yl، bgyp tHryrhm klhm wfwrA (13). 6- AlmbEdwn AlflsTynywn AlY lbnAn Almjzrp AlAsrA}ylyp fy qAnA: qrr gAly tHwyl tqryr AlAmm AlmtHdp Al*y wDEh mst$Arh AlEskry Almyjr jnrAl frAnklyn fAn kAbn En Almjzrp Alty ArtkbthA AlqwAt AlAsrA}ylyp fy bldp qAnA، btAryx 18 nysAn 1996، AlAsbAb Alty Hmlt gAly ElY AtxA* h*h AlmwAqf lEl Alsbb AlAwl hw AymAn gAly blbnAn wTn rsAlp wSAHb dwr HDAry mtmyz fy mHyTh AlErby wAlEAlm. vAnyA: AEjAbh bmsAhmp AllbnAnyyn AlAsAsyp fy AlnhDp AlErbyp fy $kl EAm wdwrhm fy mSr fy $kl xAS. vAlvA: t>vrh bAlElAqAt Alwvyqp wAlw$A}j Alty rbTt Al$Ebyn AlmSry wAllbnAny Ebr AltAryx. rAbEA: Ahmyp Alm&vrAt AlvnA}yp Alty sAhmt fy bnA' $xSyp gAly kTfl w$Ab، wAlty kAnt mzyjA mn m&vrAt vqAfyp Erbyp wfrnsyp. xAmsA: Erf gAly k>stA* jAmEy bArz wbAHv mrmwq ytSf bAldqp wAlmwDwEyp wtwxy AlHqyqp fy drAsth Alm$Akl wAlqDAyA، wdEmh AlmtwASl wEmlh Ald&wb mn Ajl Hqwq AlAnsAn، An kAn ElY mstwY AlAfrAd >w Al$Ewb، A* mn byn AnjAzAth AlbArzp fy AlAmAnp AlEAmp llAmm AlmtHdp tnZymh AlnAjH llm&tmr AlEAlmy lHqwq AlAnsAn fy fyynA، EAm 1993. sAdsA: AlAltzAm AlvAbt ll>myn AlEAm AlsAbq llAmm AlmtHdp bAlEml ltHqyq AhdAf AlmnZmp Aldwlyp wb$kl xAS AlslAm wAlAmn wHqwq AlAnsAn wAltnmyp، wtqydh bnSwS AlmyvAq wAHtrAm mkAnp AlmnZmp wqrArAthA، wrfDh ADEAfhA wxSwSA mHAwlp AlwSAyp ElyhA mn Aldwl AlkbrY، wtmskh bSlAHyAt AlAmyn AlEAm kAmlp wmmArsp Emlh ElY AsAshA. sAbEA: AymAnh An lbnAn dwlp SAHbp Hq fy AstrjAE ArADyhA wbsT syAdthA ElY kl ArADyhA. vAmnA: AqtnAEh An AsrA}yl tEtdy ElY lbnAn ftnthk syAdth، wtHtl ArADyh wtqtl AbnA'h wtstgl AwDAEh lttdxl fy $&wnh AldAxlyp wtg*y Al$Ewr AlTA}fy byn AbnA}h. tAsEA: $xSyth Alqwyp wAstqlAlyth Alty hy، fy r>ynA wlydp kfAyAth AlElmyp AlEAlyp wwDEh AlAjtmAEy Almstqr، w$jAEth AlsyAsyp Alty tsAEdh ElY mwAjhp Al*yn yxtlfwn mEh fy Alr>y، wAtxA* AlqrArAt AlmnAsbp wAn kAn Elyh An ydfE vmnA l*lk. &&& SHyH An Aldktwr gAly xrj mn mnSb AlAmAnp AlEAmp llAmm AlmtHdp، lknh dxl AltAryx mn bAbh AlwAsE lAnh ftH mErkp AstqlAl mnZmp AlAmm AlmtHdp En AlqrAr AlAmyrky، wd$n AlEml mn Ajl mA ydEY dmqrTp () AlElAqAt Aldwlyp، fAstHq vnA' mjls AlAmn Aldwly wqyAdAt syAsyp mhmp fy AlEAlm. 1- Hdyv AlY bEvp tlfzywn lbnAn - AlEwlmp wAlfrnkwfwnyp w>nbsTt mHAwr fy qSr Al>wnyskw twAlY AlbAHvwn wAl>kAdymywn mn AlEAlm wlbnAn ElY AlmqArbp w$rH AlmwDwEAt wAl>lHAH ElY Al*Atyp bry tklyf AljAmEAt Altdqyq fy AljrA}m Al>srA}ylyp(Swr)
AlEwlmp wAlfrnkwfwnyp m&tmr rkz ElY mHAwr vlAvp: rhAnAt wtHdyAt، tnmyp Alqym wEqd tHAlfAt wAEAdp t$kyl AljAmEp wkAn AfttAHh Ams Dmn Alywm AlvAlv lljmEyp AlEmwmyp AlvAnyp E$rp lrAbTp AljAmEAt AlnATqp klyA Aw jz}yA bAllgp Alfrnsyp (Awblf) wjAmEp $bkAt AltwASl Alfrnsyp (Awryf)، AlmnEqdp fy qSr AlAwnyskw bdEwp mn AljAmEp AllbnAnyp، wm$Arkp nHw 600 AkAdymy frnkwfwny mn AlEAlm mn r&sA' wEmdA' jAmEAt wmdyry m&ssAt bHvyp ymvlwn Akvr mn 400 m&ssp tElym EAl wAbHAv. AlAfttAH Alrsmy lh rEAh HADrA r}ys mjls AlnwAb nbyh bry wHDrh AlAmyn AlEAm llmnZmp Aldwlyp llfrnkwfwnyp bTrs gAly wwzrA' wnwAb. jrfyh wqdm Almdyr AlEAm lmktb AlEAlm AlErby llAwblf Aryk bynw AlmtHdvyn wAlqY r}ys AlAwblf - Awryf my$Al jrfyh klmp wHb fyhA bAlHDwr wqAl An h*A Alm&tmr hw tqlyd lljmEyp AlEmwmyp wAn mwADyEh ttnwE wt$ml AlTAwlp Almstdyrp AlAwlY xms mdAxlAt ttmHwr Hwl AlwsA}l Aljdydp Alty yqtDy AEtmAdhA fy qDAyA AqtSAdyp wsyAsyp wby}yp wqDAyA AltnwE wAlhwyp، wyHdd h*A Aljz' xyArAt AmAm AlmwATnyn wEnwAnhA rhAn wtHdyAt fy Alkwnyp. wAlTAwlp Almstdyrp AlvAnyp Hwl AHyA' Alqym wbnA' AltHAlfAt. wtsEY h*h AltHAlfAt. wAltjmEAt AlY xlq mjAlAt tEAwn mbnyp ElY qym m$trkp wAlY tnmyp AltEddyp Allgwyp wAlHwAr Al*y yHtrm mxtlf AlvqAfAt. wAlTAwlp Almstdyrp AlvAlvp Hwl AEAdp tkwyn AljAmEp. bry AlY klmp Alr}ys nbyh bry wfyhA: lqd Axtrtm AlmkAn AlmnAsb lkm، wAlzmAn AlmnAsb lnA، lEqd m&tmrkm tHt EnwAn Alfrnkwfwnyp wAlEwlmp. Aqwl: AlmkAn AlmnAsb، l>n lbnAn Al*y yfxr b>nh yDm Ahm knwz AltrAv AlAnsAny، wb>nh AlAkvr tmskA bj*wrh AlErbyp، hw fy wAqE AlAmr Anmw*j EAlmy fryd llAndmAj AlwTny lvmAny E$rp TA}fp wm*hbA ytEAy$wn ElY ArDh، l>nh ymvl Anmw*j Albld AlEAlmy Al*y ynt$r AbnA&h ElY msAHp AlEAlm bHyv nstTyE Alqwl An lbnAn، Albld AlSgyr، ymvl AmbrATwryp b$ryp lA tgyb EnhA Al$ms. whw bh*A AlmEnY bld ytmtE bmwASfAt EAlmyp hAmp tEb~r En An lbnAn AgnY AlEAlm bAnsAnh Al*y ytmtE bAldynAmykyp wAl*kA' wAlxbrp fAljAlyAt AllbnAnyp Almnt$rp fy kl mkAn mn AlEAlm $Arkt bfAElyp fy AlAHdAv wAlEmlyAt Alty SnEt HyAp tlk AlmjtmEAt wAldwl، wEqdnA qbl E$rp AyAm Alm&tmr AlvAlv llbrlmAnyyn AlmtHdryn mn ASl lbnAny wAlmnt$ryn fy vmAnyp E$r bldA ytHdvwn b>kvr lgAt AlArD. An h*A AlAnmw*j AlbrlmAny ymvl jz'A mn Alm$hd AllbnAny AlEAlmy Al*y tmyz bAnsAnh wbAnsAnyth Almdh$p، wbdymwqrATyth AlHqyqyp، why AlSfAt Alty n>ml An tlAzm mhmp bnA' AlEAlmyp AlHqyqyp. wAqwl: AlzmAn AlmnAsb lnA، l>n AnEqAd AEmAl jmEytkm wElY AlxSwS AEmAl m&tmrkm، ySAdf Swrp AlHrkp AlsyAsyp wAldymwqrATyp AljAryp bEnwAn qrAr mjls AlAmn Aldwly Alrqm 425، wbEnwAn tHryk Emlyp AlslAm fy Al$rq AlAwsT. lqd knt Aml An ttbnY AEmAl ndwtkm EnwAnA ytnAwl: ms&wlyp AdArp AlmjtmE Aldwly، fy ATAr AlEwlmp En tnfy* qrArAt mjls AlAmn Aldwly wdwr Alfrnkwfwn fy h*A AlmjAl، xSwSA tjAh lbnAn Albld AlEDw fy AljmEyp AlEAlmyp lnwAb Alfrnkwfwnyp، wAlEDw fy AtHAd AljAmEAt Alfrnkwfwnyp wwkAlp AltEAwn AlvqAfy wAltqny Alfrnkwfwnyp. A$yr AlY *lk، l>n Awl tHdyAt AlEwlmp hw tvbyt AlSdqyp Aldwlyp، bt>kyd Anh lA AstvnA'At fy tTbyq AlqrArAt Aldwlyp. wnqwl *lk lAnnA nkAd nSAb bAlAHbAT، wlA Aqwl bAly>s، l>nnA $Eb mqAwm. wnHn nrY AlnZAm AlEAlmy AlrAhn ykAd ygfr lAsrA}yl AHtlAlhA llArADy AlErbyp wxSwSAF AllbnAnyp wAEtdA'AthA Alywmyp AlmtwASlp bmxtlf AnwAE AlAslHp ElY lbnAn، wsyAsp AlqmE Almstmrp wAlmtSAEdp Dd Erb AlArADy AlmHtlp wAljwlAn. ASbH DrwryAF An yltft AlEAlm AlHr~ wxASp Alm&ssAt Alfrnkwfwnyp، AlY AlmHrqp AlHqyqyp Alty twASl AsrA}yl A$EAlhA fy Al$rq AlAwsT mn* Avnyn wstyn EAmA، wAlty TAwlt bAlmjAzr AljmAEyp wEmlyAt Alqtl wAlAbAdp Akvrmn mlywn Erby. Anny fy h*A AlATAr AtmnY ElY AlwkAlp Alfrnkfwnyp lljAmEAt wAltElym AlEAly، tklyf AlbAHvyn mn mxtlf AljAmEAt Altdqyq fy jrA}m AlHrb AlAsrA}ylyp Almrtkbp Dd AlAnsAnyp، wAlty kAn |xrhA mjzrp qAnA، kmsAhmp fy AldEwp lsyAdp AlqwAnyn Aldwlyp wfy AzAlp Althdyd AldA}m llAmn wAlslAm Aldwlyyn. Ebw wAlmHADrp AlAfttAHyp kAnt lr}Ys jAmEp Alqdys ywsf AlAb slym Ebw Hwl AEAdp AlnZr fy A$kAlyp AlxSwSyAt. wErD AlAb Ebw Drwrp Altjdyd fy mqArbp qDAyA AlvqAfp wAlhwyp wAlmwATnyp wqAl: hnAk wsyltAn lqrA'p t>vyrAt AlEwlmp: AlqrA'p AlAjtmAEyp AlAqtSAdyp wAlqrA'p AlvqAfyp. AlvqAfp AljmAEyp thm$ AlAntAj Alfkry wAlqdrAt AlAbdAEyp ldY AlmwATnyn ltHwylhm AlY mjrd msthlkyn. wAlSnAEp AlAElAnyp tsEY AlY mrAqbp *hnyAt Almsthlkyn wtwHyd slwkhm. yrY AlbED An AltbAynAt AlvqAfyp hy mn mxlfAt AlmADy wAnhA stkwn fy Twr AlzwAl fy syAq AlEwlmp. tsEY AlvqAfp AljmAEyp AlY mHArbp AltnwE AlvqAfy Al*y y$kl EA}qA tjAh nmTyp AntAj Alswq. wAlSnAEp AlAElAnyp tryd tjAns AlHAjAt wAltSrfAt mn xlAl trbyp Almsthlk. wAntqd AlAb slym Ebw AltbsyT lqDAyA AlvqAfp wqAl: AlvqAfp، AyA kAnt، lA txtzl bmjmwEp mn AlmlAmH AlASylp، Aw Almnqwlp. AnhA nZAm mtdAxl wAnmAT tfkyr wslwk wAHAsys wZyfthA AstEAdp mstmrp ltrAv xAS AstnAdA AlY tHdyAt AlHyAp Alywmyp. EndmA ynql $Eb mA AntAjA vqAfyA fAnh ydrkh wyfsrh mn xlAl tqAlydh AlxASp. AyA kAn Hjm h*A AlAstyrAd wkvAfp Ewlmth fAnh ln y&dy AlY tjAns vqAfy، wlkn AlY mzyj wAxtlAT. lA Ewlmp wAHdp bl EwlmAt mmzwjp. lkl mnhA mlAmHh wmnTqh.
